title: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (%)
name: sg.gen.parl.zs
readme: Women in parliaments are the percentage of parliamentary seats in a single or lower chamber held by women.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: Women in parliaments are the percentage of parliamentary seats in a single or lower chamber held by women.
